name: Goat Cheese Dressing
recipeYield: 4 servings, enough for a total of 6 ounces greens
keywords: fresh herbs, goat cheese, low-fat milk, side dish
recipeIngredient: 3 or 4 sprigs thyme, marjoram or oregano to yield 1 1/2 tablespoons of chopped leaves

recipeInstructions.text: In small bowl, mash cheese with milk until smooth. Stir herbs into cheese mixture. Toss with greens.
